official_title: A Novel Imaging Modality to Evaluate Radiation-Induced Uterine Injury
inclusion_criteria:
1. Female
2. 15 ≤ age of treatment < 40 years
3. Treated with PRT at UCH
4. Received ≥ 50 Gy PRT
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 15 Years
Must have maximum age of 40 Years
exclusion_criteria:
1. Patients who underwent hysterectomy for treatment of a primary gynecologic malignancy
2. Patients that are currently pregnant
